summary: This FBI 302 form documents the retrieval and handling of evidence (a pair of black women's cowboy boots, size 8) by a Special Agent. The evidence was secured and submitted to the Evidence Control Room on June 30, 2021, with a request to forward it to New York. The document is subject to a protective order.

persons.name: TFO
persons.context: The Task Force Officer (TFO) transported the evidence to the Resident Agency, secured it in a locked drawer, and submitted it to the Evidence Control Room.

events.title: Evidence Retrieval
events.description: An FBI Special Agent retrieved evidence consisting of one pair of black women's cowboy boots, size 8, and was issued an FD-597 receipt.

events.title: Evidence Submission
events.description: The evidence (boots) was transported to the Resident Agency, secured in a locked drawer, and submitted to the Evidence Control Room. A request was made to forward the evidence to New York.

keyFacts: Evidence retrieved includes one pair of black women's cowboy boots, size 8.
The evidence was secured and submitted to the Evidence Control Room on June 30, 2021.
A request was made to forward the evidence to New York for further investigation.
The document is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs (7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17).
The evidence handling follows FBI protocol, including issuance of an FD-597 receipt and secure storage.
